reviews_data.review_text: The coffee was good and the staff very friendly and attentive.

Nothing against them - but it's not a wine  bar.    They have wine but it's a crepe/ ? Breakfast place with wine.  Kinda misleading because it's not at their core of who they are.  Like many small businesses they see it as a way to spread  their business model but ultimately it will work against them.

Wow! Friends told us about the Vibe Cafe And Wine Bar, and our quiet evening turned out too be the fun meeting friends over wine and tasty appetizers, listening to live music, and dancing. Thank you Vibe!

Great first experience! The staff was friendly and engaging the name of the establishment fits the atmosphere inside and out. My spanikopita was delicious &  evenly baked, the tatziki sauce was equally good and full of flavor. A few other pros, the radio station they listen to streams from Greece and the sounds are great üëçüèæ, there's wifi, free street parking
Great spot along with great vibes!
Such a good place to chill at. So many things u can buy, so many choices of food and coffee. Good stuff and especially the new Greek guy knows how to do his job. J.S.

OMG! This is totally a vibe!! The Berry Cheesecake Belgian Waffle was Delicious!! The breakfast waffle sandwich was off the chain too! The personality of the Owner Vasili and Logan truly give this place it's name sake!
Very good!
Delicious üòã
We had a few crepes and different types of coffee, and they were all delicious! Staff and environment were fantastic, and we will definitely be coming back again!
Working time is wrong. Was closed on sunday
Fantastic super friendly, relaxing environment. We had coffee and a latte coffee definitely will return for a glass of wine.
Great place and excellent service!! The ham and cheese crepe and wine recommendation was awesome. I highly recommend and will definitely be back!

This cafe is the place to be! They have the most genuine and welcoming atmosphere and delicious coffee that is the perfect unique pick me up.  If you work from home, this is a great place to work, I've spent hours at a time here. And the food is absolutely delicious. I have honestly been here for work, study, and even came back in the evening for drinks with friends. This is my go-to spot and I hope more people get to experience this incredible place!
Great cozy environment!
(Translated by Google) Delicious and very friendly. Snacks for dogs are also available.  (Original) ÎßõÏûàÍ≥†, Îß§Ïö∞ ÏπúÏ†àÌï©ÎãàÎã§. Í∞ïÏïÑÏßÄÎ•º ÏúÑÌïú Í∞ÑÏãùÎèÑ Ï§ÄÎπÑÎêòÏñ¥ ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§.
Fantastic food, and service
Great atmosphere, staff and food was great as well

This is one of my favorite places in Charlotte, and a regular ‚Äúgo-to‚Äù. The food is excellent, the service is amazing and they all have a genuine kindness. Also, they are very dog-friendly (pups allowed just inside the door, not inside the restaurant itself) and they provide treats and water. I love this place and always recommend to friends.
Amazing place! Great coffee and desserts!
Amazing place to try out coffees!! Highly recommend caramel frappe (they also have a sugar free option) and Greek coffee and baklava. The last two were out of the world!!
Such a great spot for anytime of day. Food and coffee are tasty, staff is friendly, and they have a great wine selection. Definitely check out Vibe if you haven't yet!
The service and food was great. We tried the sunday waffle, nutella and banana waffle, caprese crepe, and the Mediterranean pita and they were all delicious. Great spot for savory or sweet bites.

Favorite coffee shop & cafe in charlotte! Great local spot that's tucked away but still in a great location. Not only do they have delicious coffee & the best chai latte in town‚Ä¶ their panini sandwiches are to die for! I love coming to work here with my laptop or grab a casual lunch. Must try!!

Logan at Vibe was the best! The vibe of vibe will def bring us back! We got there a little before closing and they treated us as if they had jugs opened!  Can't wait to come back, set up shop and do some work while enjoying the atmosphere and customer service!  Marcus & Avery

This is the SWEETEST little cafe! I've been a couple of times now - service is amazing. Cece is a true gem. Crepes are awesome and so many fun coffees to choose from. Great place to work outside at too!
Good service, but the coffee just wasn't very good.

I went here looking for something light to eat and get some coffee, and wasn't disappointed. It was surprisingly not busy on a very nice Saturday and the staff were just really on point, I honestly haven't had staff at a restaurant that good since I lived in Japan, and that's saying something as restaurant staff in Japan are all top notch. The prices were what you would expect nowadays, but the serving size was surprisingly large. I got the chicken pita sandwich and it was a good sandwich, better than Panera for sure. BTW, their baklava was the best I've had in a while, definitely worth a try.
The best hangout spot in Charlotte!
Incredible food, wonderful place to relax and eat!!
Great caf√®. I would like to sit at this Cafe one day and enjoy a fredo cappuccino instead of taking it on the road.
The only thing better than their food and coffee is their hospitality.

Vibe caf√© is always a good idea. I love their crepes, their cappuccino is to die for and last time I went I tried the Nutella banana waffle which cooked fresh to order. To top it off, their server is an absolute pearl. Prime customer service.

Everything we ordered, crepe, dolmates and greek salad ware super tasty! One of the places in the US where you actually get coffee in your coffee! Love the place! And so pity we were just passing by and don't live in Charlotte

Delicious food excellent coffee and wonderful owners. The waiter Charles is very helpful and has great recommendations. I personally love the breakfast bowl and capuchino. Penelope makes delicious cheese and spinach pies from scratch.
Awesome owners and they allow you to smoke cigars on the outdoor patio while offering fantastic coffee and beverages.
The service here was nothing short of amazing. I do recommend and will return.
The wine was great, the food was AMAZING, and the service was spectacular. Chill vibes and helpful servers.

What a great place to come chill and be amongst people who will become your friends. The service is outstanding, the food is delicious and I can't say enough great things about the atmosphere.  If you have a sweet tooth, I highly recommend the Strawberry Shortcake...it's so good, it has become my weekly habit!
I absolutely love this place! Good food, music, and the staff were so nice and gentle!
Loved the experience. The owner/bartender really cares and the food and beer were a delight. It felt very special.
Food was delicious, service was on point and friendly.
Amazing food, vibe, and experience. Service was also amazing. I wish I can give them 10 stars. Highly recommend.
Fabulous custom service and the food is amazing.

This is my new favorite spot for meetups or just chilling out. I visited for the first time last week and had a really great conversation with one of the owner's, Tony. I wanted to know the story behind this place and he shared it with me with so much excitement. I love when people are passionate about what they are doing. He explained the coffee menu to me and made recommendations.  Service was impeccable as was the food and coffee. It's definitely ‚Äúa vibe.‚Äù

Love this place! This is a hidden gem in the Dilworth area. Excellent family owned place with outstanding service, staff, food, and drinks. Their coffee is great, particularly their seasonal specials and lattes. Their cold brew is perfect and strong, particularly great when you have a big work day ahead of you. I recommend the avocado toast or yogurt bowl for breakfast/brunch (two of my favorites), and their Italian panini or avocado and turkey panini for lunch.  Their greek yogurt is some of the best that I have ever had. Their pastries are also outstanding. The staff is warm and kind and recognize familiar faces.  Great for staying and eating inside (or outside) with friends, or ordering pick up or a quick coffee and sandwich if you're on the run.  Has a dog friendly outside area with a water bowl and treats. 100% recommend! Love it.
Enjoyed stopping in for an afternoon coffee. Everyone was extremely friendly and welcoming! I absolutely recommend coming by and will certainly be back.

Very accommodating and overall great food. We came in when they were a bit busy but they really took the time to make sure we didn't have any questions and they really take pride in their food and service.
I never knew this place existed until recently! Amazing service. Warm & cozy atmosphere. Good food. Will definitely be returning!
Great food with even better staff

Great new Family owned place on East Blvd‚Äîcan be a little hard to see since it is beside RED but glad we found it. The Waffles with blueberries, strawberries and bananas are the best with their Turkish coffee!!
Amazing vibe, unbelievably kind and helpful staff, best sandwiches I've had in Charlotte, and a delicious vanilla oat milk latte. I highly recommend visiting!

Went by there yesterday and the breakfast waffle was definitely hitting.  Awesome coffee and great drinks. The prices are extremely reasonable and the staff were warm and welcoming.  Definitely will be coming back soon!

I really enjoyed meeting the family behind this establishment! I asked if they would cater my bridal shower. A few months later, my bridesmaids contacted them and got a great list of catered options together. All party guests had such high remarks/compliments about the food and said they'd love to know where I got the food and that they now want to visit the cafe too!

Love the atmosphere here ! It's very chill and relaxing . We had a hot coffee and a hot tea ! We also enjoyed a piece of chocolate cake which was amazing ! We will definitely be back to check out the rest of the menu! Excellent service !
Very loud, but liked the coffee. Not a place to study and chill
Amazing food and service.  Love it
Exceptional!!
This place was amazing! Loved the loukmades:) People were so sweet here!
Great service, great ambiance, great food, and above excellent coffee. Thank you TONY, Logan, Billy, Grecia, and Charles for an awesome experience.

The coffee and food is outstanding. Great place to grab a coffee and just relax. It's a much better feeling that you get just by walking in compared to a Starbucks. The people here are friendly and attentive. Dilworth has needed a spot like this for a long time.
Very nice food and excellent customer service.
Such a nice little find. Great food choices in a low key comfortable setting. Family run. Recommend.
Love this place! The friendliest people work there & will make you feel so welcome. Authentic Greek beer & wine. We can't wait to return!
Great food and service!
My bf and I love this place! He's a coffee lover and has never had a bad coffee. The service is amazing and we love their menu. Great for a chill night or a light bite. The vibes really are great
My friends and I love this place! The food, coffee, and wine are all great but what really keeps us coming back are the staff. They always remember us and are so friendly!
I tried the sweet crepe and it's delicious !!
Best coffee I've had in the city! The food was delicious too. Staff was super friendly and helpful
Grate food  and staff was very friendly good place to chill
I met a friend there for a couple of glasses of wine it was very nice atmosphere
Fantastic place for coffee!!!
A real Greek salad! The roasted feta was also amazing!

Stopped in today to have a cup of coffee and I have to say this was great experience. Our server Logan was awesome and made us feel very welcomed and excited about the cafe would highly recommend stopping by
Great service and a wonderful atmosphere! Their crepes are delicious!
Great service, wine options were pretty decent, very nice atmosphere. Sundae crepe was decadent. Great indoor and outdoor seating options. Little expensive, but otherwise had a great time.

Good Vibes only at this place! :) I'm glad it opened up. They are the only place in Charlotte that cooks their hot Greek coffee in Hot Sand, and they also have a good selection of sweet/savory crepes and wine and beer. That's the reason I stopped in, but the real reason I keep going back is the staff. Everyone's always smiling and willing to go above and beyond to make sure your experience and your "vibe" is always positive. ;) Great Job guys!
Cool intimate bar. Perfect for being out but not being around a lot of people.  Bar staff is excellent and with dazzling personality
Awesome coffee and killer food! Nice fresh Greek food! Charlotte needed this, worth checking out for sure

Being Greek, I always get very excited to see new Greek options open in Charlotte, and these brothers Vasili and Antoni have succeeded with Vibe! The minute you walk in you are greeted by a wonderful team (mostly family) with a smile.  They offer Greek coffee which is brewed on sand and also iced Greek frappe and freddo cappuccino (my fave) as well as other Italian classics: espresso, lattes, etc.  I love that it is such a European atmosphere; besides Greeks, you'll find Serbians, Bosnians, Italians, Russians and others there enjoying.  Must Try: *Crepes (Savory & Sweet) my favorite is the Nutella and banana with Papadopoulo cookie crumbs!  *Spanakopita (no description necessary)  *Greek Yogurt with fresh fruits and honey  *Greek Salad  *"The Vibe" Ice Cream Sundae
Great coffee, vibes & service.
Good food, variety of coffee drinks and super friendly owners
Great service, food and coffee. Love the spanakopita!

Amazing Greek coffee options, phenomenal staff, and food looks amazing. I went to this place based on a referral I received from the owner of Ilios Crafted Greek and I'm so glad I did! If you want an amazing Greek coffee (rather difficult to accomplish in my book), this place is a must. I had the Freddo Cappuccino which is a double iced espresso with frothed milk and it was absolutely amazing. The quality of coffee, richness of flavor and authentic Greek coffee taste makes it one of my new favorites. I plan to try the frappe next and then migrate to a few of the hot coffee options.  I went back for a second time to check out their food and was very pleasantly surprised. The turkey avocado panini is everything I would have expected with the perfect blend of seasoning and ingredients so every item of the sandwich could be tasted without one thing overwhelming the others. My colleague ordered the Greek Toast and said it too was perfect and exactly what he was hoping for.  We also ordered the sundae crepe which of I were on vacation, I would literally eat every day of the vacation. The cookie interior was perfect without being too much frosting or cookie. The crepe was perfectly fine and the gelato on top literally made it the perfect dessert for all ages. I will absolutely be back for more!  If you are looking for a place with amazing Greek coffee and delicious desserts while also serving great quality and healthy food (to justify The desserts and coffeeüòâ), I would highly recommend checking this place out! The desserts are definitely what is drawing most people along with the amazing Greek coffee, but with food that's delicious as well, it's worth adding to the list of spots to check out.

Just spent an evening here with friends and shared tons of appetizers. The waiters were very attentive and took their time to answer all of our questions. The food was wonderful. It was a great night for friends and good food. Thank you for making us feel so special.

Referred here by @yelpelitechick on IG! Great spot, terrific service! The brothers aka the owners, as well as the other staff are so gracious and accommodating! Patronize this place ASAP! You won't be disappointed!
Food is amazing.  And it's a family run restaurant.   Exactly the type of place to support.  You wont be disappointed.
Family owned, well priced, great coffee, amazing crepes and everything else on the menu. Most of all great VIBES!
I love this place. Very cozy and excellent service!!!
Good luck brothers!!! You did great!!! 5 ‚≠êÔ∏è

This place is a hidden gem and I have a feeling it's going to blow up really soon. The owners really do create a welcoming, chill and fun VIBE. The food is delicious and unique, the coffee is so authentic and you could tell everything is done with passion. This is not just any other another cafe! I suggest you try it out before it explodes and is always busy  but that's just my prediction :)

Vibe Cafe is what I have been looking for in Charlotte. A place with great service and hospitality. A place where friends can gather and consistently have quality coffee. A place that has great menu items for when the hunger kicks in. The Tiropita/Spanakopita is a my favorite appetizer. I personally love the spinach one more. All the crepes, savory and sweet, were excellent. Next time, I have to try the waffles as they looked delicious when others ordered them. I have ordered almost every coffee on the menu. The Freddo Cappuccino holds my number one spot as of now. To each their own, but one thing I'm sure everyone will agree on is the quality of the espresso compared to any other place in Charlotte.
Amazing coffee, amazing food, and great owners! I will definitely be back to try more food but the Nutella banana crepes were simply amazing!

Omg the crepes here are beyond amazing! I had the freddo cappachino which was delicious with my craving for coffee. The customer service was exceptional. I welcome anyone  to come to this amazing place. I will be coming back soon
I stopped in with my wife and we enjoyed the food and the Greek coffee! The service was excellent and food was also very good! Operated by a nice family and made the atmosphere very relaxing!

Amazing cafe in a happening spot on East Blvd.  Great selection of wine and beer. I can't wait to go back and try some of the other items on the menu. We had the cucumber bites appetizer...my compliments to the creator of this dish!  Soooo good!  We also had the Mediterranean Pita and it was so fresh and tasty and not too heavy. The tzatziki spread was delicious.  My wife had the Apple Pecan salad and loved it.  Looking forward to tasting some of the desserts and authentic coffee. Give this place a try you won't be disappointed!!

Amazing Place! Run by two brothers and you can see the passion they have in this place. The food is amazing and the service is exceptional. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone looking for a fun night!
Place has a cool atmosphere, owners are awesome!!!! Great spot to grab a coffee
Absolutely incredible spot. The coffee is AMAZING and the food was incredible! Warm, inviting atmosphere with a friendly and helpful staff. Would definitely recommend, and will be returning!
Great coffee and wine spot! Love the Greek coffees and Greek beer
Love the place they have items that you can't find anywhere else in Charlotte as in Greek coffees and food.
Great atmosphere, great food, the owners make you feel right at home. The name is perfect because I love the Vibe.
